Name: Measure Naming Convention
Description: Ensure that all visible measures begin with one of the allowed prefixes: total_, count_, max_, or min_. This promotes consistency and clarity in measure naming.

Name: Measure Contains TODO
Description: Measures that contain the placeholder 'TODO' in their expression indicate incomplete work and should be reviewed and finalized.

Name: Duplicate Measure Code
Description: Measures that have identical DAX expressions but different names indicate duplicate logic. Consolidate these measures to avoid redundancy and potential maintenance issues.
